extensionDescription.message: Sends the selected text from your Firefox browser to a Trello board.

notificationDesc.message: Your snippet was added to your Trello board.  A Hint: Save more snippets like that and read them regurarly to be a successfull person or a robot.

notificationDescNo.message: Something not-so-good happened.  A Hint: Go and check your settings page, but don't forget to smile.
